name: WordPress Widget Export File
summary: Learn about .WIE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Widget Importer & Exporter allows you to import a WIE file into other sites or restore a widget to a site at a later time. Once installed in WordPress, the Widget Importer & Exporter is available under "Tools" in the Dashboard. Exported WIE files are commonly stored in the "XML" folder of your theme folder.

description: Exported widget file created by Widget Importer & Exporter, a WordPress plugin used to import and export widgets; contains a widget in JSON format that has been exported from a WordPress site.
